title: GIP 1-Enable purchase Fragments to improve liquidity pool
body:
Users can use any kind of token to buy fragments, we will support some popular DeFi tokens at first. The funds collected from selling Fragments will be converted back to ETH & GDS and then added to the Uniswap ETH-GDS pool. The liquidity added from selling fragments will be locked in the pool forever, this will ensure healthy liquidity for GDS and help support the token price.

However, this is considered an easy way to get Fragment compared to farming, thus the price of each fragment should be fair enough. The cost should be increased for each purchase by a certain amount to prevent whales overbought fragments, this global price mechanism will be reset back to its original state every 2 weeks. If you choose to provide liquidity, you should get the Fragment quite easy but if you just want to buy fragments to summon your favorite Goddess, there is an option.

Pro:
- Can onboard more users, who do not want to join the liquidity pool
- A source to provide more liquidity for GDS token
- Help increase the price of GDS when buying from the pool

Con:
- The price for Fragment should be high

We will have a sub-proposal if this idea is approved to determine the price for each Fragment.
author: 0x49c7B67C2aB965dc74f17e5E7FdFE9783a832181
